name: AMPLE INC
sampleDescriptions: Electric vehicle charging infrastructure with a focus on battery swap technology.
Electric vehicle charging infrastructure with a focus on battery swap technology.
Ample is lobbying for inclusion of electric vehicle battery swapping in legislation on electric vehicle charging, and for performance-based incentives for clean energy (e.g. electric miles). Ample is
